title: Help Nidalee please...
body: I just played a nidalee game and her clear is god awful. It isnt even up to par untill you complete your jg item. Im sad ;(

replies.body:
ahhh yes, the 

"I can't clear the jungle" so please buff <insert jungle champ here> syndrome.

nice

If you want a good pathing strat,I can say my usual pathing:
-Buy talisman and 3 pots
-Start blue,dont smite it,save it for wolves or gromp(Depending on how damaged you are)
-Kill Blue the normal way,ward behind blue so you dont get it stolen when blue is halfway dead and before your teammate(s) leave to lane(they should leave when it's about 500-700 hp)
-go gromp,pop a potion and kill it(you should be able to live if you heal inbetween with your E when possible)
-go to wolves,kill spear the big wolf and claw AoE all 3,auto the smaller wolves and save the Q on human and tiger for big wolf,smite the big wolf whenever you want to heal up,you should pop a potion sometime in this fight as well
-you should be pretty healthy,and a good amount of mana left,go to your red and do what nidalees do to red,kite it into the bottom bush of red so the enemy can't steal it if it's warded,of course ward behind red before doing red ,you are going to smite this one too and pop the last potion sometime in this battle
-now you have options,do scuttle and grab the fruits in river to heal up OR if you were good enough to not be hurt as much then gank,you should B back after the gank or if you did scuttle+fruits you could either search around their jungle or do gromp(don't do raptors or krugs yet,they're a bit too much for you until you Back...unless you're really healthy then you can do raptors)

That's about it o,0 you should have enough gold for a jungle knife+boots or the 435g AP item or even all 3 if you ganked and got a kill, Your welcome :)
Actually I think her clear is way better,you are probably not using the correct pathing
Nidalee is literally the worst champion right now. Even behind Akali and Katarina, which should tell you how much she's been nerfed.
